books.author: by J. K. Rowling
books.description: The sudden death of a parish councilman reveals bitter social divisions in an idyllic English town; a novel for adults by the creator of Harry Potter.
books.name: THE CASUAL VACANCY

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: A college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: n Book 2 of the Century trilogy, members of five interrelated families from five countries grapple with the tumultuous historical events of the years 1939-49.
books.name: WINTER OF THE WORLD

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: A carload of people involved in a conspiracy pick up a disheveled hitchhiker, Child’s vigilante hero Jack Reacher.
books.name: A WANTED MAN

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Two troubled people develop an intense, obsessive relationship.
books.name: BARED TO YOU

books.author: by Mitch Albom
books.description: A fable about the inventor of the world’s first clock; from the author of “Tuesdays With Morrie.”
books.name: THE TIME KEEPER

books.author: by J.R. Ward
books.description: After a man stumbles in front of the reporter Mels Carmichael’s car, both find they’re in over their heads.
books.name: RAPTURE

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: A young biologist warns world leaders about the reasons for escalating animal attacks on cities.
books.name: ZOO

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: A woman makes disturbing discoveries when she writes a book about her sister’s murder.
books.name: LOW PRESSURE

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: Both in Fool’s Gold, Calif., only reluctantly, a dancing teacher and a bad-boy lawyer are drawn together.
books.name: A FOOL'S GOLD CHRISTMAS

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: Five interrelated families from five countries are caught in the upheavals of World War I and the Russian Revolution.
books.name: FALL OF GIANTS

books.author: by H. P. Mallory
books.description: Back from a round of time travel, the Queen of the Underworld must now protect her realm from the sinister Lurkers; a Jolie Wilkins novel.
books.name: SOMETHING WITCHY THIS WAY COMES
